column3:
How to use this sheet: This sheet is designed to allow you to track your progress.  
Once you have mastered a grammar point or vocabulary / kanji  change the selector in Yes and your progress percentage will update
This is a read only version - go to FILE > MAKE A COPY to download to your own google drive
